name: Dangerously Radioactive Aquarium Simulator
description:
An idle game about blasting fish with ionizing radiation, causing horrific genetic mutations, in order to collect Ion Points. Bask in the glory of your colorful and deadly fish tank.

Built in 72 hours for Mini Jam 76: Radiation. Requires only a mouse to play. 

Font credits: http://www.zone38.net/
